active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate: 'Crypto's pseudonymity makes full AML compliance impossible.' Divide into teams: Propose arguments for/against, using FATF standards and real-world cases (e.g., Binance fines). Synthesize class consensus on balanced compliance approaches.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Base on common misconceptions: e.g., 'Crypto is fully anonymous/untraceable', 'Travel Rule bans transfers', 'Only US rules apply globally'.
Use real-world distractors: Law enforcement (FBI) vs standards (FATF), regional limits (US-only).
Ensure plausibility: Partial truths (e.g., 'Privacy coins evade rules' – actually enhanced monitoring needed).
